name: Friday Night Ghostin
description: Hiya! This is an fnf mod! Called "Friday Night Ghostin" I'm currently updating it so for now only weeks 1 and 6 are modded. but more are soon too come! Sorry it isn't able to be played on web D: also senpai and spirit are supposed to have seizures- lol. If any bugs appear email me at bunshroom51@gmail.com   Hope you enjoy this mini mod! :D Disclaimer: I CREATED THIS MOD, DO NOT PUBLISH THIS WITHOUT MY PERMISSION. (This is the 2nd time I lost my account so this is technically mine as I was the og creator but lost my account- again)
